text: Ça fait quatre fois que je commande là. Livraison assez rapide et pas trop cher comparé à d'autres endroits. Les futomakis Montréal sont absolument délicieux! Le seul bémol du menu est que presque tous les makis ont du tempura.  J'aime ça mais pas dans tout le plateau. Sinon tout est frais et bon.  J'ai commandé une fois au choix du chef mais je préfère à la carte pour être certaine d'avoir mes sortes préférées.
really good and fresh sushi! the place  doesn't look like much from the outside but i was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food !  I will certainly go back when i'm in the neighborhood

When our current go-to sushi place was closed we decided to try out ordering from sushi sama. We made a good choice! First of all, despite the massive snowfall earlier that day our order arrived quite a bit before the estimated time. Then there's the sushi itself: yum! Very tasty! And lots of imaginative rolls, different combinations than your standard California, Kamikaze, etc. In particular we enjoyed the unfortunately named Erotica. It wasn't particularly erotic, in my opinion, but was definitely creative, a maki roll topped with tartare. You'd think it would be too big to eat, but it was manageable. Bonus points for the illustrated takeout menu, a big plus to be able to quickly identify the rolls you are eating. I will definitely order again!

Excellent bar à sushi à Rosemont. J'ai eu la chance de goûter à une grande sélection de leurs sushis, ainsi qu'à leur pizza sushi et un de leur poke bowls ; tout était délicieux. Je recommande fortement à tous ceux dans le coin !

Always fresh, good quality and fairly priced. Veggie options as well. Quick delivery-you can call in or order online. Freebies with your order! Small but clean dinning room and friendly service, but I would def recommend takeout.

Nous avons pris des sushis à emporter...un plateau à partager! 
Les sushis et makis sont très variés et composés de différentes espèces de poissons, toutes plus fraîches les unes que les autres! 
Leur plateau sont colorés et donnent envie de se jeter dessus et de dévorer ses petits morceaux de plaisir!
J'apprécie de commander un plateau de sushis et d'être émerveillée par la surprise des différentes pièces qui s'assemblent et se coordonnent à la perfection! 
Les portions sont généreuses et ils ne sont pas avares s'agissant des sauces de type soja, cacahouète et épicée.... et des portions de gingembre! 
Le seul petit bémol pourrait être la trop grande présence du tempura dans leur création! 
Enfin il est appréciable de déguster ces sushis sachant qu'en plus je n'ai pas été obligée de me couper un bras pour les régler!
This is definitely one of my favourite sushi places in Montreal! The fish is very fresh, the portions are generous, and everything melts in your mouth. I would definitely recommend this place!

Ever notice how many poke spots or Hawaiian themed restaurants started popping up in hte last year or two? While most spots have trendy and instagram worthy decor, most places don't really have amazing quality food for the price you pay. Enter Sushi Sama...

Good: Trust the reviews. I was originally downtown and looking to settle for some mediocre downtown place that has poke, but after consulting Yelp, the promising reviews of Sushi Sama had me sold. The restaurant is a bit dated looking, but the food is very fresh. Each bowl is perfectly portioned and doesn't leave you feeling bloated. The ratio of fish to greens and rice is PERFECT. I can't get over how amazing this place is. While sitting down, the take out orders were non stop coming and going, so you know this place has an established clientele.

Bad: I wasn't a fan of the tuna in my bowl, it was a bit too salty for my liking so I just ordered the salmon poke bowl next time I went. 

Bottom Line: For the same price as other poke bowls, this one by far exceeds all my expectations. The food tastes as good as it looks. I mean, I drove from downtown to the east end to purposely eat here...10/10 would recommend,

Amazing small restaurant!
The poke is obsoletely delicious! Very big size with cheap price. And the sushi is also good!
The best poke  I ever had so far and the sushis are  to die for!!!!! The rice was sooooo tasty new fave sushi/poke place I will go back for sure
The sushi melts in your mouth. It was so good. We ordered the spicy tuna, double salmon, and special crisp rolls. All very good.

Les meilleurs sushis de livraison que j'ai mangés de toute ma crisse de vie. Les ingrédients sont super frais, les sushis, aussi bien les plateaux assortis qu'à la carte sont délicieux (même ceux avec du fromage à la crème que je déteste normalement sont bons).

Le staff est vraiment sympathique et serviable, et la livraison est toujours plus rapide que les estimations du gars à l'autre bout de la ligne.

Les prix sont vraiment abordables, et y a d'excellents deals sur les plateaux et même sur les sushis à la carte.
I discovered this place on just eats, where it also had very good reviews. The sushi was fresh and tasty. Delivery didnt take too long and came sooner than expected.

We went for the poke and it was excellent! The fish was fresh and in plentiful quantity and the vegetables and seasoned rice were lovely. Definitely better than all the poke places downtown. I'm excited to try their sushi as well! Their illustrated menu is such a nice touch!

Mon 1er 5 étoiles!! Ça veut tout dire à mon avis. Ce petit restaurant sur beaubien est une adresse à retenir surtout si vous êtes du quartier. Ils ne veulent plus me livrer au centre ville à mon grand désespoir haha!! Tous les items sont bons, les sushis sont tellement frais, variés et bien remplis pas juste plein de concombre pour remplir non!  Tu veux du saumon en voilà, du crabe allez on te gâte!!! Les sushis desserts qui viennent en cadeau avec un achat de plus de 45$ (je ne suis pas certaine du montant exact mais je le dépasse toujours) sont à essayer kiwi, bananes, fraises, croustillant et sauce style crème anglaise à rouler par terre!! Tout ce que je leur souhaite c'est plus de succursales et de préférence au centre ville :D
Great sushi at a good price. Friendly fast service. Went here when we were visiting last year and came back for more.
Definitely amazing! I ordered the poke and sushi, both of them are perfect! It is better than furusato and I would be back again.

ATMOSPHERE: It's a pretty small restaurant. It can seat up to 15 people max. Seems to be more of a take-out style restaurant in my opinion. The inside is nice and modern. It's about a 3 minute walk from the metro so it's very convenient.

FOOD: The food was very good! I had the salmon and tuna poke bowl. The ingredients were fresh and very tasty. The flavours merged well together and the bonito flakes mixed with rice was heavenly. It didn't fill me up but it was still yummy. The sushi looks promising as well. 

PRICE: I came here during their opening day so I was able to receive 50% off and it came up to 9$. Pretty worth it! Poke bowls range from 13-15$ with sides that are 1-2$ extra.

SERVICE: The service was very good and quick. The cashier had a bit of difficulty speaking English but it wasn't a big deal at all.
